m_szDocTitle: Detroit motor show 2016: NAIAS live highlights in pictures by CAR Magazine
m_szDocSumamry: Detroit motor show 2016: NAIAS live highlights in pictures Published: 12 January 2016 The Ford Performance PR machine gathers momentum. First customer GTs will be delivered late 2016, and the racer debuts at Daytona in a few weeks time, but Le Mans in June will be the V6 supercar's day(s) of reckoning Audi's H-tron concept: very yellow, and (potentially) very clever BMW's M2 Coupe channels the spirit of the 1M Coupe - and the past-master E30 M3 Chevy's Bolt is an all-new electric car with a claimed 200-mile range from a 9hr charge It's minus 10 degrees outside, but the Detroit show's already h
